_meanings:
{@--6@} To leave off
speaking, cease, stop.

{@--7@} To be 
removed, come to an end, cease, 
disappear; <ls>Bg. 2. 59</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">14. 22</ls>;  
<ls>Ms. 11. 185</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">186.</ls>

{@--8@} To be accomplished or
finished, come to an end.

{@--9@} To be
withheld or withdrawn from.

{@--1@} To cause to return,
send back; <ls>R. 2. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 47</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 44.</ls>
